attributes.action: Call a general election as soon as possible.
attributes.background: There needs to be a general election as soon as possible, as manifesto promises have been breached and about the financial state of the country.  There must be a general election as soon as possible and there must be a debate on this as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
